* Model: M670
* Website: http://www.msimiami.com/spanish/products/detail_spec/M670-SPEC_spa.htm

=== Last tested on ===
Ubuntu Desktop 8.04 Hardy Heron Alpha 4 (amd64)

=== Current Issues ===
* Gutsy: This laptop do not boot with kernels newer than 2.6.20, so Gutsy do not boot in this laptop out of the box.
The only way to boot the LiveCD is deactivating acpi with acpi=off option at grub. But the installed system only boots with the folowing kernel parameters: noapic nomce nosmp.
* Hardy: This laptop boots fine with kernel 2.6.24. No kernel parameters needed.
The issues yet to be fixed are: Problems after resuming from hibernation, Microdia integrated webcam is not detected (gspca project), power source detection and random freezes in powernowd (it worked fine in alpha 3 but broken in alpha 4).
